data.title: Finally upscale place to go out for drinks
data.text: This is an absolutely wonderful place!!The decor, food, and wine is very good and it's very clean. Great for parties of any kind wished Harlingen would get more places like Carlitos!!!

data.title: The beer is better!
data.text: Carlito's has a good selection of draught and bottled beers. The food is light fare, but consistently tasty. Wine sales are usually good, but often they're out of what's on the list. Live music on market days (1st Saturday afternoon of the month) with Cleo, Evey, and Emmanuel Martinez is worth going to! Lots of fun!

data.title: Great place for Harlingen
data.text: Great place to chill and have glass of wine. Very good appetizers, cheese trays. Bartender Jay knowledgeable with wine list. Nice atmosphere.

data.title: Wonderful surprise in Harlingen
data.text:
Beautiful surroundings, very artistically executed. Had wonderful opportunity to spend time with owners Luis & Mercedes. 

Nice selection of Texas wines including Messina Hof Sangria & Chenin Blanc. Super cheese platter & Italian hot dog surprise. 

Wonderful entertainment, great location and very friendly environment.

data.title: A beautiful space, extensive wine list.
data.text: This is a little gem of a place tucked away on Jackson Street in downtown Harlingen.  It is beautifully designed with exposed brick walls, concrete floors and large seating areas.  An extensive wine list - and the night we were there some terrific deals on some of them.  We were here enroute to dinner, and thus I cannot speak to the menu. We will be back soon and often I expect.

data.title: Wonderful Wine & More
data.text: Carlito's is a well-kept secret! The wine and beverage selection is expansive, the food is delicious and the service is equal to being a guest in someone's home! Comfy atmosphere, great location, and anytime they have musical entertainment, it's even better. Can't say enough great things about this place!

data.title: Surprise! Great wine bar downtown.
data.text: This is a great new addition for Harlingen. A single friend of ours used to complain there were no nice bars for a drink date in Harlingen. He moved to Florida just before Carlito's opened. We meet friends there about once a week. The wine and beer lists are impressive and there are two nice cheese plates and a good hot cheese sandwich.The only negative is the limited kitchen so we generally plan dinner elsewhere. Nonetheless the owners from Austin deserve our applause for taking a chance on a nice wine bar in Harlingen.  .

data.title: Finally a nice place to relax and have some wine and a decent plate of cheese.
data.text: For the longest time my wife and I had been waiting for Harlingen to get its very own wine and cheese place. We were tired of having to travel to McAllen in order to enjoy some fine wine and cheese and meats platter. They do have a nice wine selection and the menu is varied enough to satisfy most wine connoisseurs. If you happen to live in Harlingen or just visiting the area, I'd definitely recommend Carlitos.

data.title: Just What Downtown Harlingen Needed
data.text: This is a fantastic place for a glass of wine and a little entertainment. There is a variety of seating from high top tables to overstuffed couches to a table for two. There is a limited food menu but everything we've tried has been excellent from the flat bread pizzas to the meat, cheese and fruit classic platter. There are drink/wine and lunch specials throughout the week (closed on Mondays) and local entertainment on the weekend. Service is great with attentive wait staff. You can't go wrong choosing Carlito's Winehouse.

data.title: Great place to unwind
data.text: Owners have created a great place for relaxation. Large selection of wine as well as beer , coffee and tea. Lunch specials are availbe. Live music on Friday and Saturday night. Can get crowded on Art Nights and special events. Check put big screen televisions with sporting events. Worth the price for a fun evening.
